content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, it's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you are interested in renting the apartment. Let's discuss the price and find a mutually agreeable amount. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a place that is both comfortable and affordable. I'm willing to pay €750 per month for the apartment.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria, considering the size and location of the apartment, I believe €750 is a fair price. Would you be agreeable to signing a one-year lease at this rate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, Mr. Heine, I would be agreeable to signing a one-year lease at €750 per month. I'm glad we could reach an agreement. Thank you for offering me the apartment.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Excellent, Maria! I'm delighted to have you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can assist you with. Once we have the lease ready, we can schedule a time for you to come and sign it. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
